page.title: 03ARCHAEOLOGICAL DIG
page.content:
Perhaps the most notable find of the dig so far is a{Bellarmine Flagon}of about{1599.}This type of vessel normally used for holding wine takes its name from a{16th Century}Italian Saint.
A fine collection of{wine glasses,} probably 17th century,some clay pipes and an iron spur have also been discovered.
Many items have been well preserved in the layers of sand and clay. There is some evidence of an earlier chalk floor and the analysis of various soil samples should help to determine whether this site was part of a{medieval}street frontage.
